english_text: In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
persian_text: به نام خدا، بخشنده ترين، مهربان ترين.

english_text: Condemned are the works of Abee Lahab, and he is condemned.*
persian_text: كارهای ابولهب محكوم گرديد و او لعنت شده است.*
footnote: *111:1 Abee Lahab was Muhammad's uncle and the leader of the opposition. His wife carried out a campaign of persecution against Muhammad and the believers. Like all descriptions of Heaven and Hell, the rope of thorns is an allegory.

arabic_text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
english_text: His money and whatever he has accomplished will never help him.
persian_text: مال او و آنچه به دست آورده است، هرگز او را كمك نخواهد كرد.

english_text: He has incurred the blazing Hell.
persian_text: او به آتش سوزان دوزخ گرفتار شده است.

english_text: Also his wife, who led the persecution.
persian_text: همچنين، زن او كه آزار و اذيت را رهبری می كرد.

english_text: She will be (resurrected) with a rope of thorns around her neck.
persian_text: او با ريسمانی از خار به دور گردنش (برانگيخته) خواهد شد.
